I‚Äôve had this game for over 5 years! I always come back to it. I love that it‚Äôs not pay to play. And 1 game can last over an hour. I wish they made more games like this. Now all companies wanna do is make money off of the user in order to advance in level. This game is truly a strategy game without the BS. I highly recommend it.

Since 2012 or so, I have been through a few devices. Even when I had 16gb devices, this game was always installed. I primarily game on PC. This game may not be shiniest or newest, but it can be taken anywhere. I can‚Äôt lug around my PC. 

Repetitive? Sure. Absolutely worth the price? Definitely. I‚Äôve easily put 500 hours into this game. If I really think about it, probably more like 1,000. $5? $6? My ‚Äúcost to playtime‚Äù on PC is a lot higher, and I usually don‚Äôt put this kind of time into a single game.

This game is now 10 years old. I first started playing around 2012 on my old iPad. I used to always play this game on car rides to the grocery store or around town. I had a lot of fun with it. The AI can be challenging at the higher difficulties which kept the game interesting, but at the lower difficulties it was also fun just to see how much you could build up. I downloaded this game again a few days ago after not having touched it in years. Now, as a college student with much more responsibilities and commitments in life sometimes I miss the days when I was carefree and a kid. Playing this game again hit me hard. It hit me because it was nostalgic, but also because as an adult now this game in my opinion is still very good. When I have free time between classes or a break at work I pull out my phone and pick up whatever save I have going. This game isn‚Äôt anything groundbreaking, but it‚Äôs fun to play. It‚Äôs an RTS so if you‚Äôre into that I would definitely say get this game. Hats off to the developer, thanks for being a part of my childhood.

title.label: Total Annihilation for the tablet era

content.label: It‚Äôs true what they say. This is Total Annihilation / Supreme Commander for tablets. Without the builder bots, it‚Äôs a little simpler and the games go a bit faster.  You get a wide variety of terrains and climates to choose from. You have to fight for special resources that you can use to build mega weapons.  Each one is different, and enables different weapons.  I like that little twist.  Be warned, this is a very addictive game.

I miss these games. Buy them & done! Can play them on a plane without wifi or in a hole waiting for hell to ffffreeezze over. The thee computer random hardest setting is a challenge. You can start & stop & Nobody is upset with you... say you have a phone call or kids interrupt you... yup it‚Äôs still there. The last of the good free ones. I‚Äôm just sorry more makers can‚Äôt figure this one out.
Awesome game, flat out addicting!

This fantastic piece of art defines the concept of Command And Conquer. The Units are perfectly executed, there is no lag or crashing what so ever, the randomly generated maps continually make me want to play on, the graphics are absolutely stunning, and the music... Oh the music, it just fits in so well it's perfectly suited for this kind of action, a rock and roll with a hint of techno sprinkled in to give it that sort of futuristic vibe the game requires. All and all this game is perfect, I am completely hooked and I hope to see this game in the top charts VERY soon.

title.label: WARNING TO PEOPLE WHO BUY THIS

content.label: Warning THIS GAME IS SO GOOD IT WILL MAKE YOU PLAY TILL SOMEONE RIPS U OFF IT OR YOUR PHONE DIES!!! CRACK IS THE 2 BIGGEST ADDICTION THIS GAME IS THE WORLDS BEST ADDICTION REQUIRING HOURS OF THERAPY TO DELETE IT

Truly a genuine real time strategy game on iOS! The skirmish mode with AI players never gets old.
It allows up to 4 players (You and 3 AI players) on any number of random maps, including plains, islands, and so on.
Up to 1000 units and the touch screen controls work very well. 
The only downside is the AI could use some work later in game, they don't always attack later in the game. And on Assassination mode (where the objective is to keep your leader alive at all costs) the AI is very careless with their leader they will often send him to attack your base by himself for an easy kill.
Since Assassination mode is my favorite game type its a shame the AI doesn't protect its leader.
Other than that though this is hands down the best RTS available on iOS!
This game is really cool, but if you're new to rts games it's very complicated and takes some practice to get used to.  But the scale of the game is amazing
Good game but need iPad mini support because the screen gets cut of

Better than command and conquer on an Xbox.

Warning.. May loose track of hours/minutes

For fans of Total Annihilation, Supreme Commander, etc, this is the best RTS available. I love this game. The only thing I would very much like to see is support for third-party add-on units like Cavedog supported in TA. TA still has a strong community 17 years after release. Can you imagine an iPhone app pulling of the same feat? LASW could very well do it.
That's It. And Minor Control Fixes

title.label: Very Good, Do yourself a favor

content.label:
Do yourself a favor and get this game. Good game. I do however have a problemo. It isn't really hard to win. I have tried everything to make the AI very difficult I would really appreciate huge bonuses given to the AI because it is no fun when you're completely slaughtering them on robotic and they don't even use all their troops to attack back I have seen some in the back hiding in a force field a couple of inches (iPhone screen length) from their base. I never even got nuked when on robotic I even purposely didn't buy the illuminati middle defense.

Although it is an amazing game. I love to play it.

First off i want to say it is very rare i write reviews for ios games because quite simply most of them are not very good. I was very skeptical when i saw this game mainly because it is rare that i find a game where I feel that all the rts elements work well together. After i started playing however all my doubt went away. This is truly an amazing game. When you first start it up it may look like an older version of pc fallout or some other old strategy game but after you start playing thats the last thing you think of. The way this game runs is perfect. It has a very simple defensive/offensive system so if you prefer to lay and wait for your opponent or rush right in and obliterate them you can do pretty much whatever tactic suits you best. The units at your disposal never seem to over powered until you start building bigger and better things that your enemy may not have. The matches are great with being so varied and randomized and i can honestly say this is a game that never began to feel boring. Quite simply I highly suggest getting this game. It is more than worth the .99 cents and it you are a true rts/strategy fan you wont regret this purchase.
This is a great rts, with lots of units and abilities, i dont think i will ever delete this game. I am totally going to buy the second one!
